segments.text: Oh my gosh, the sink is overflowing without anyone noticing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just cascading down like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, polishing her plate, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And behind her, the boy's on a stool that's practically dancing—wow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, looking so bold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, like she's in on the secret adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back, I didn't expect it to be that precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is widening, and her shoe's already wet—crazy!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene compared to this indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Didn't see the cookie theft coming in such a domestic setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window panes make the whole thing feel unexpectedly exposed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm shocked at how many hazards are piling up unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
